results.title: A Little memory
results.creator_credit: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.

results.title: Little journey
results.creator_credit: Keith Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Keith remembers little of his early years - separated from his parents and living with his grandparents. His father had been sent to a Re-education Camp and his mother had moved away. On his father’s release from the Camp the family was reunited and several years later they escaped from the hardships of Vietnam to seek a better life in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Keith Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Keith remembers little of his early years - separated from his parents and living with his grandparents. His father had been sent to a Re-education Camp and his mother had moved away. On his father’s release from the Camp the family was reunited and several years later they escaped from the hardships of Vietnam to seek a better life in Australia.
description_for_label: Keith remembers little of his early years - separated from his parents and living with his grandparents. His father had been sent to a Re-education Camp and his mother had moved away. On his father’s release from the Camp the family was reunited and several years later they escaped from the hardships of Vietnam to seek a better life in Australia.

results.title: A Life in community
results.creator_credit: Than Van Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Arriving in Australia as a refugee from Vietnam, Than Van Nguyen has dedicated his life to community involvement and the Vietnamese community, with his principal goal being ‘solidarity, unity, being united’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Than Van Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Journey to freedom
results.creator_credit: Gia Binh Lieu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Escaping from Vietnam in 1988 to look for freedom, Gia Binh Lieu became a refugee and settled in Australia. His story is of family and disconnection, of survival and a better future.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gia Binh Lieu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Journey to a new land
results.creator_credit: Tuan Anh Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Leaving family and escaping from Vietnam in 1978 and eventually arriving in Australia by boat as a refugee, it would be six years before Tuan Anh Tran could finally be reunited with his family.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tuan Anh Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Leaving family and escaping from Vietnam in 1978 and eventually arriving in Australia by boat as a refugee, it would be six years before Tuan Anh Tran could finally be reunited with his family.

results.title: I left my country
results.creator_credit: Joseph Xuan-Minh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In 1982 Joseph fled from Vietnam and its Communist regime finally arriving in Australia in 1983 as a refugee. He tells of his journey, of leaving family behind, his resettlement in Australia and how seven years later he was finally able to bring his family to Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Joseph Xuan-Minh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: In 1982 Joseph fled from Vietnam and its Communist regime finally arriving in Australia in 1983 as a refugee. He tells of his journey, of leaving family behind, his resettlement in Australia and how seven years later he was finally able to bring his family to Australia.

results.title: China tour
results.creator_credit: ACMI, ACMI Digital Storytelling and Si Tuan Lieng
results.brief_description: Si Tuan Lieng and his wife are retirees and have recently made an overseas trip to China. In this story he talks about his life and family, their integration into Australian society since they left Vietnam over 26 years ago and highlights of their holiday in China.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI, ACMI Digital Storytelling and Si Tuan Lieng
results.description: Si Tuan Lieng and his wife are retirees and have recently made an overseas trip to China. In this story he talks about his life and family, their integration into Australian society since they left Vietnam over 26 years ago and highlights of their holiday in China.

results.title: Australia - my chosen home
results.creator_credit: Vinh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vinh’s study trip to Australia in 1997 changed his life forever. Hanoi may have been the place of his childhood memories but Australia would turn out to be a part of his life - his true home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vinh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: About my dad
results.creator_credit: Huong Duy Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Like his father, Huong Duy Pham was also a soldier in the South Vietnam Army. But his family connections were to prove too dangerous and Huong eventually escaped by boat and made his way to Australia where he is now living with his wife and three sons. He dedicates this story to his father.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Huong Duy Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Arabic men)
results.brief_description: Nine young men from various Arabic backgrounds share their stories and memories of family, country and culture through this ACMI digital storytelling workshop held on 10-12 October 2007, sponsored by Mens Line Australia.
